column3: Treeger said that we could have all this cool stuff from the basement
Oh no-no-no, I’m, I’m paddling away
We get all this rusty crap for free
This and a bunch of bubble wrap
And, some of it is not even popped
Could we be more white trash
Good thing Chandler’s not here, he always wins at this game
I just told my Mom I’d cater a party for her
Because I need the money, and I thought that it’d be a great way to get rid of that last little schmidgen of self-respect
Come on, I think this is a good thing
I don’t think Mom would’ve hired you if she didn’t think you were good at what you do
You don’t have to stick up for her
Umm, do you guys have any juice
I ah, bumped into Joanna on the street yesterday
Well, no, actually she uh, asked me if I wanted to get a drink
You ah, you didn’t say ‘Yes’ to that did you
Last time you went out with her you said she was a ‘big, dull dud
Well, I think I judged her too quickly, and this time we were able to take the relationship to the next level
Well, last time I almost got fired
You must end it, you must end it now
It’s not like this is an everyday occurrence for me
I mean usually I’m pretty much just in there by myself
Promise me, you will end it
Okay, I promise, I’ll end it
I hope you know what I’m giving up for ya, because she’s not just the boss in your office, if you know what I mean
Oh-oh, sorry, I-I knew what he meant
Doing great, the quiches are coming along
Yeah, I thought it was cute
Ahh, that’s what your Grandmother’s hands looked like when we found her
Let me ask you a question
Oh, well Richard raved about the food at his party, of course you were sleeping with him
Then I heard the food at that lesbian wedding was very nice, I assume you weren’t sleeping with anybody there
Though, at least that would be something
She hired me because she thinks I’m good
Oh yeah, she didn’t hire me out of pity, it wasn’t so she could pick on me in front of her friends, she actually thinks I’m good
And hey, it’s cool if you’re a lesbian
Good afternoon, are you the decision maker of the house
Do you ah, currently own a set of encyclopedias
But ah, try the classifieds, people sell everything in there
Let me ask you one question
Do your friends ever have a conversation and you just nod along even though you’re not really sure what they’re talking about
…I think he deserves a Nobel Prize
…it was like the Algonquin kids table
Excuse me, I’m sorry, you haven’t said anything for about two and a half minutes, are you at all interested
Oh, I know, I never wear fake ones
I just did it so my Mom wouldn’t give me grief about me biting them
Oh, no, I meant that it’s weird that you only have nine now
Wait a minute, I had them put…  Oh my God
I’m gonna go to the store, I’m gonna get you another set of nails, no one’s gonna know, and you’re gonna look great
Oh, it’s ‘cause they’re gonna eat—that’s the problem
Okay ah, please don’t freak out
Umm, but ah, there’s a blue fingernail in one of the quiche cups, and there’s no way to know which one
Whoever finds it wins the prize
It’s nothing, it’s just that now your Father owes me five dollars
You bet I’d lose a nail
I just bet I’d need these
You bet that I’d screw up
So all that stuff about hiring me because I was good was…
This was just in case you pulled a Monica
Weinburg, you’d never use that phrase
Oh honey, come on, have a sense of humour, you’ve never been able to laugh at yourself
My Mom doesn’t have any faith in me
Op, the ruined quiches are ready
It just doesn’t…feel like we’re breaking up
Uh, can’t you wait until tomorrow
No, no, that was my boss
When I walk outside naked people throw garbage at me
Just a little gag gift somebody gave me
Ah-ha, you’re not the boss of me
I’ll be back in ten minutes
You are, you’re gonna leave me like this
Knowing you’re here, waiting for me I think it’s kinda exciting
But if you don’t come back soon,  there’s pretty much nothing I can do about it
I brought you back a macaroon
I’ll keep it in my butt with your nose
That’s weird, she locked the door
She’s got the Christmas bonus list in there
I saw her working on it this morning
Okay, swear you won’t tell, but when Mark left he gave me a key to Joanna’s office
Do you wanna see the list
I’m really sorry but I may be a little while longer
A couple of hours, I feel awful
You get back here right now
Rachel, could I see you for a moment
The keys to the cuffs are on the back of the door
Could you be a doll and grab them and scoot on over and unlock me
And on a totally different subject, that is a lovely pantsuit
You promised you would break up with her
I did break up with her
She just took it really, really well
And the fact that you were jeopardising my career never entered your mind
But then something happened that made it, shoot right out
Y'know what Chandler, you got yourself into those cuffs, you get yourself out of them
I can’t get myself right out of them
You must have me confused with the Amazing Chandler
Come on, you have to unlock me, she could be gone for hours, and I’m cold, and
You never come into this office again
You give me back my Walkman
No, I just always see guys doing this when they get handcuffs taken off them
What are you gonna tell Joanna
When she sees that you’re gone, she’s gonna know that I let you out, and that I was in here, and I’m gonna get fired
I’m good at lying, I actually did borrow your Walkman
No, there’s nothing to make up, she’s gonna know that I have a key to her office, I’ve got to get you locked up back the way you were
What do you know about Van Gogh
I thought he cut off his ear ‘cause he sucked
What else you got in there
Let’s see, ahhh… Where does the Pope live
No wait-wait, that’s the joke answer
Now ahh, what do you know about vulcanised rubber
This used to be your room
You must’ve been in really good shape as a kid
I can’t believe I actually thought she could change
Well, who cares what your Mom thinks
Oh good, I’m glad that’s catching on
No but, why does that have to be a bad thing
Go down there and prove your Mother wrong
Finish the job you were hired to do, and we’ll call that pulling a Monica
Okay, umm, if a kid gets straight A’s, his parents would say, "Yeah, he pulled a Monica
Or a fireman saves a baby, and they go, "Yeah I know, he pulled a Monica
" Or someone hits a homerun and the announcer says, "Yeah, that one’s outta here
All right, I’ll go down there
But, I’m not gonna serve the lasagna
I’m gonna serve something I make
Chandler, please, I have to get you locked up back the way you were, I am sooo gonna lose my job, she’s very private about her office
Hey, look, you’re in trouble either way
If she comes back and sees me locked to this instead of the chair, she’s gonna know you were in here
So you might as well just let me go
What if I clean your bathroom for a month
All I want is my freedom
I’ll take all of your photos and put them into photo albums
God, would you just calm down
I’m gonna say this for the last time
There’s a lot I didn’t know about vomit
So, what do you say, Joey
You get the whole set of encyclopedias for twelve hundred dollars, which works out to just 50 bucks a book
I’m home in the middle of the day, and I got patio furniture in my living room
I guess there’s a few things you don’t get from book learnin’
Well ah, what can you swing
How about zero down and zero a month for a long, long time
You wanna see what I got
I’ve got a baby Tootsie Roll, a movie stub, keys, a Kleenex, a rock, and an army man
Huh, these must be Chandler’s pants
For 50 bucks, you can get one book
Oh, I-I think I’m gonna stick with the V, I wanna see how this bad boy turns out
I ah, will buy and wrap all of your Christmas gifts
I’ll squeeze you fresh orange juice every morning
There’s gonna be rumours about this, there’s no way to stop it
Sophie knows, Monica and Phoebe know
How do Monica and Phoebe know
And when they ask me what I saw, I can be very generous  or very  stingy
I can make you a legend
I can make you this generation’s Milton Berle
They’re not even touching the lasagna
It’s hard to believe that just a little while ago this was nothing but ingredients
Well, everyone seems to be enjoying your dish
I thought it was… quite tasty
So if everyone liked it, and you liked it, that would make this a success
Well, I was going for wrong, but we can use your word
Yes, well I was wrong, and I have to say you really impressed me today
Umm, you might even say that she pulled a Monica
She doesn’t know we switched it
And the next time you cater for me, there will be nothing but ice in the freezer
Oh, and Mom, don’t bite your nails
So did you break up with Joanna
Well, it’s good thing you got out when you did, before she blew up like that Vesuvius
And speaking of volcanoes, man are they a violent igneous rock formation
Oh yeah, lava spewing, hot ash, of course some are dormant
Why are you talking about volcanoes all of the sudden
Well, we can talk about something else
What do you want to talk about
Did anybody see that-that documentary on the Korean War
Oh God, Korea is such a beautiful country
Rachel, could you come in here for a moment, please
Umm, they didn’t have poppy seed bagels, so I…  Oh my word
I seem to have had a slight office mishap
Could you please get the key off the back of the door for me
You tell your friend Chandler that we’re definately broken up this time
